sourcesContent: import React from "react" import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css" import { MapContainer, Popup, Marker,TileLayer } from 'react-leaflet' import { Icon } from "leaflet" const costumIcon = new Icon({ iconUrl:require("./img/icono.png") ,iconSize:[38.38] }) const MapView = ({ip ,lat,lon}) => { const position = [lat,lon] return( <> {ip} ) } export default MapView
